pre: G20 ; set units to INCHES (Shark HD4 default)
G17 ; XY plane selection for arcs
G94 ; set feed rate to inches per minute
G0 F100 ; default rapid feed rate 100 IPM
post: G0 Z0.5 ; raise Z to safe height (0.5 inches)
G0 X0 Y0 ; return to origin
tool-change: M0 ; pause for manual tool change
G0 Z0.5 ; move to safe Z for tool change
spindle: M3 S{speed} ; spindle on at {speed} RPM
